column1: Kata Robata////Been here many times but the service sucked this time. The hostess was rude and the waiter made excuses for the dish that was sold out (something about brunch?)
column2: said other dishes might also be sold out but didn't mention which ones. I have tried to order the bone marrow 4 times in a row now and it has always been sold out
column3: whether it was a weekday or early weekend evening.
